## Features of Autodesk Softimage v2012 SP1
 
According to the official website of Autodesk Softimage[^1^], some of the features of Autodesk Softimage v2012 SP1 software are:
 
- ICE Modeling: A new capability that allows you to create geometry using ICE nodes and compounds.
- Workflow Enhancements: Improvements to the user interface, animation tools, scene management, and scripting.
- Lagoa Multiphysics Compounds: A set of ICE compounds that enable you to simulate complex physical phenomena such as cloth, fluids, and rigid bodies.
- Enhanced Interoperability: Better integration with Autodesk Entertainment Creation Suite Premium products, such as Maya, 3ds Max, MotionBuilder, and Mudbox.
- Support for Latest Technology Trends: Compatibility with Windows 7, DirectX 11, Python 2.6.4, and mental ray 3.9.

## Requirements of Autodesk Softimage v2012 SP1
 
The minimum system requirements for running Autodesk Softimage v2012 SP1 software on Windows 32-bit systems are[^1^]:

- Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP Professional (SP3 or higher), Microsoft Windows Vista Business (SP2 or higher), Microsoft Windows 7 Professional (SP1 or higher)
- Processor: Intel Pentium D processor (or higher) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 processor (or higher)
- Memory: 2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
- Hard Disk Space: 3 GB free disk space for installation
- Graphics Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory (512 MB recommended)
- Display Resolution: 1280 x 1024 or higher
- Optical Drive: DVD-ROM drive
